description: Get information about a specific bot alias.

parameters.name: botAliasId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot alias to describe.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bot associated with the bot alias to describe.

nested_items.name: botAliasId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot alias.

nested_items.name: botAliasName
nested_items.description: The name of the bot alias.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the bot alias.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot associated with the bot alias.

nested_items.name: botAliasLocaleSettings
nested_items.description: The locale settings that are unique to the alias.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Determines whether the locale is enabled for the bot. If the value is false, the locale isn't available for use.

nested_items.name: codeHookSpecification
nested_items.description: Specifies the Lambda function that should be used in the locale.

nested_items.name: lambdaCodeHook
nested_items.description: Specifies a Lambda function that verifies requests to a bot or fulfills the user's request to a bot.

nested_items.name: lambdaARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function.

nested_items.name: codeHookInterfaceVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the request-response that you want Amazon Lex to use to invoke your Lambda function.

nested_items.name: conversationLogSettings
nested_items.description: Specifics of how Amazon Lex logs text and audio conversations with the bot associated with the alias.

nested_items.name: textLogSettings
nested_items.description: The Amazon CloudWatch Logs settings for logging text and metadata.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Determines whether conversation logs should be stored for an alias.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: Defines the Amazon CloudWatch Logs destination log group for conversation text logs.

nested_items.name: cloudWatch
nested_items.description: Defines the Amazon CloudWatch Logs log group where text and metadata logs are delivered.

nested_items.name: cloudWatchLogGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the log group where text and metadata logs are delivered.

nested_items.name: logPrefix
nested_items.description: The prefix of the log stream name within the log group that you specified.

nested_items.name: selectiveLoggingEnabled
nested_items.description: The option to enable selective conversation log capture for text.

nested_items.name: audioLogSettings
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 settings for logging audio to an S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Determines whether audio logging in enabled for the bot.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The location of audio log files collected when conversation logging is enabled for a bot.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (KMS) key for encrypting audio log files stored in an S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: s3BucketArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon S3 bucket where audio log files are stored.

nested_items.name: logPrefix
nested_items.description: The S3 prefix to assign to audio log files.

nested_items.name: selectiveLoggingEnabled
nested_items.description: The option to enable selective conversation log capture for audio.

nested_items.name: sentimentAnalysisSettings
nested_items.description: Determines whether Amazon Lex will use Amazon Comprehend to detect the sentiment of user utterances.

nested_items.name: detectSentiment
nested_items.description: Sets whether Amazon Lex uses Amazon Comprehend to detect the sentiment of user utterances.

nested_items.name: botAliasHistoryEvents
nested_items.description: A list of events that affect a bot alias. For example, an event is recorded when the version that the alias points to changes.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the bot that was used in the event.

nested_items.name: startDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the event started.

nested_items.name: endDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the event ended.

nested_items.name: botAliasStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the alias. When the alias is Available, the alias is ready for use with your bot.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bot associated with the bot alias.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of the date and time that the alias was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of the date and time that the alias was last updated.

nested_items.name: parentBotNetworks
nested_items.description: A list of the networks to which the bot alias you described belongs.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the network of bots assigned by Amazon Lex.

nested_items.name: botVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the network of bots.
